Topic.Title: Can a moderator please delete my account?

Posts.EditableText:
Hello, I would like to make this short and simple.

I would kindly ask that a moderator or someone with the privileges to delete my account on the forums as well as the actual website (textadventures.co.uk). My username for both is DavetheWave1302. Thank you!
